description.en:
ICE Poker is a inflationary and play to earn token. It is a new token created by the Decentral Games theme introducing new tokenomics to enable poker players to earn money by competing in competition and completing daily challenges.

The only way for DG ICE token to be minted is by winning poker games. Players can sell the token in the market or burn it to upgrade wearables NFTs.

Wearables are special NFTs that players need to purchase or rent in order to earn while competing in poker games.
